passage_text: ACE, “the helpful place” Hardware Corporation is much more than a hardware store. In 80 years, ACE has grown from a small cooperative band of Chicago hardware store owners to over 4800 locations in 70 countries.

Ace Hardware began as a small chain of stores in 1924 and has grown to include more than 4,600 stores in 50 states and more than 70 countries.As part of a cooperative, every Ace Hardware store is independently owned.
Ace hardware opens at around 7am but some of the ace hardware stores are opened for 24 hour/.

Description: As your local Ace Hardware, our store is a member of the largest retailer-owned hardware cooperative in the industry. Ace Hardware began as a small chain of stores in 1924 and has grown to include more than 4,600 stores in 50 states and more than 70 countries.As part of a cooperative, every Ace Hardware store is independently owned.

Pt. Ace Hardware Indonesia Tbk. (IDX: ACES) has opened the world's largest Ace Hardware shop, 14,695 square metres (158,180 sq ft), in Living World Mall Alam Sutera, South Tangerang, Indonesia. On December 2, 2011 there were 52 Ace Hardware shops in

Established in 1962. As your local Ace Hardware, our store is a member of the largest retailer-owned hardware cooperative in the industry. Ace Hardware began as a small chain of stores in 1924 and has grown to include more than 4,600 stores in 50 states and more than 70 countries.
